systems.name: Server (Hono API)
systems.description: 22+ route files (v2: roadmap, epics, milestones, releases, systems, labels, automations + existing). Hono framework, WebSocket + file watcher. Multi-project hot-swap via project-config.ts. Docs CRUD, headless AI runner, automation engine, scheduler. Build passes clean. 0 open issues. Last commit: Feb 7 22:16 UTC. Automation engine and scheduler are built but untested in production. No new commits in 24+ hours — stable but aging. 4 uncommitted data file changes pending.

systems.name: Web UI (React + Tailwind)
systems.description: 12+ views: Dashboard (v2 with health ring), Roadmap (kanban DnD), Systems (new), Issues, Ideas, Codebase (react-flow graph), Sessions, Changelog, Docs, Metrics, Settings (3-tab with Profile/AI Config/Integrations). AI chat sidebar. Notification tray. Project switcher. Lucide icons throughout. UI design overhaul phase 1 complete, phase 2 stalled (no activity since Feb 8). Chat agent built but NEVER battle-tested with real browser conversations — this is the #1 risk. Multiple crash bugs were fixed (ISS-017/018/019) but new bugs may lurk untested.

systems.name: AI Intelligence Layer
systems.description: AIService across OpenAI/Anthropic/Google with Helicone proxy. Auto-model-discovery (58 models). Task-aware ModelRouter with fallback chains. ~40 tools across 16 domain modules (server/ai/tools/). ChatService with multi-turn agent loop. SSE streaming. User profiles injected into system prompts. Headless runner for programmatic agent execution. RISKS: (1) Chat agent never tested with real conversations in browser — 9+ days in_progress, still the #1 blocker. (2) Helicone integration FAILING (ISS-003). (3) Headless runner tested via automations but not with full conversation flows. (4) No validated end-to-end flow from user message → tool calls → response in browser.

systems.name: CLI
systems.description: Full command set (init, start, status, backlog, issues, changelog, context, projects). Multi-project support (init, start, list). Pillar initialized successfully. NEVER fully tested against live server — fundamental risk. npm link crashes Cursor — must use 'npx tsx' workaround. No activity or attention since Feb 7. Lowest confidence system. Needs live validation before dogfooding on other projects. Risk of silent failures when used for real.

systems.name: Data Layer (JSON + TypeScript)
systems.description: v2 entity model: 14 entities, ~500 lines of shared types. Store reads from v2 paths with backward compat. File watcher syncs. JSON-based with typed interfaces. Data directories: roadmap/, systems/, releases/, activity/, labels/, automations/, docs/, issues/, ideas/, session/, brain/, ai/, metrics/. Migration script completed. Central registry at ~/.dev-track/. Most mature system. DATA INTEGRITY GAP: Sessions 6-7 velocity data missing from velocity log (ISS-020). 15 modified data files uncommitted to git.

systems.name: Integration Plugins
systems.description: 8 plugins: GitHub (passing, last tested Feb 7), Vercel (unconfigured), Supabase (unconfigured), Sentry (unconfigured), Helicone (configured, FAILING since Feb 8 01:56 UTC), Upstash (unconfigured), AWS EC2 (unconfigured), Cloudflare (unconfigured). Only 1/8 confirmed working. Helicone failure blocks AI cost tracking for dogfooding. Credential sync from plugin to AI proxy built (ISS-015 resolved) but Helicone still failing — may be API endpoint issue or credential format issue. ISS-003 still open.

systems.name: Codebase Architecture Visualizer
systems.description: react-flow graph with 3 views (module, file, dependency). Plain-English module descriptions and relationship labels via generateModuleDescription()/generateEdgeLabel(). Rich detail panel. Scanner-generated descriptions from code analysis. ISS-007 resolved. Last scan Feb 8 04:19 UTC — reflects post-v2 codebase (96 files, 19K lines). Graph data is current but visualizer code unchanged since Feb 7. No known bugs but untested with latest scan data in browser.

systems.name: Codebase Scanner
systems.description: Generic module inference via directory analysis. generateModuleDescription() and generateEdgeLabel() for rich descriptions. Auto-discovery approach — no annotations needed. Last scan: Feb 8 04:19 UTC — current with post-v2 codebase (96 files, 19K lines, 11 modules). Scanner code itself unchanged since Feb 7. Functional but aging — no improvements or maintenance since initial build.

systems.name: AI Brain System
systems.description: AI memory system: 18 notes total (4 dismissed, 14 active). User preferences (4 prefs + 4 learned patterns). Context recovery for session handoff (last refreshed Feb 8 04:18 UTC). User profiles with AI-observed intelligence scoring (IQ 127, cognitive + technical radar charts, deep assessment, session observations). Brain notes accumulating — BN-015 through BN-018 are large weekly report / audit summaries that may bloat context loading. Some older active notes (BN-002, BN-004, BN-005, BN-006) are still valid but aging.

systems.name: Cursor Rule / AI Context
systems.description: alwaysApply frontmatter, mandatory pre/post checklist at top, inline Quick Status + Last Session Briefing (auto-regenerated), file map, session lifecycle instructions, AI autonomy permissions, standing instructions. ISS-006 (AI drift) still open — structural enforcement via automation engine built but untested. Context recovery refreshed Feb 8 and again during this audit session. The rule itself may be stale relative to entity model v2 changes (file map, entity references). Needs validation in next real coding session.

systems.name: Session Tracking & Velocity
systems.description: 8 sessions logged in session log (includes 2 backfilled). 60+ changelog entries. Velocity tracked: 89 items shipped, 293 points across 8 sessions. Avg 11.1 items/session, 36.6 pts/session. ISS-020 RESOLVED: Sessions 6-7 backfilled from activity data. v2 unified Session type in use. No session currently active. Velocity data now accurate and complete.
